entry.title: github创建博客
entry.content:
github创建博客

工具准备

在本地电脑上执行

安装nodjs

  1. 下载并安装工具包

下载地址 https://nodejs.org/en/download/

下载工具后双击安装包一步步安装即可。

https://nodejs.org/dist/v16.18.0/node-v16.18.0-x64.msi

  1. 检查安装结果

    C:\Users\fzb>node -vv16.18.0

安装git客户端

参考文档 https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/

  1. 下载并安装工具包

下载地址 https://git-scm.com/download/

​下载工具后双击安装包一步步安装即可。

https://github.com/git-for-windows/git/releases/download/v2.38.0.windows.1/Git-2.38.0-64-bit.exe

  1. 检查安装结果

    C:\Users\fzb>git --versiongit version 2.7.2.windows.1

Hexo下载

  1. 下载并安装Hexo

    C:\Users\fzb>npm install hexo-cli -g安装时间可能会10分钟左右

  2. 检查安装结果

    C:\WINDOWS\system32>hexo -vhexo-cli: 4.3.0os: win32 10.0.18363node: 16.18.0v8: 9.4.146.26-node.22uv: 1.43.0zlib: 1.2.11brotli: 1.0.9ares: 1.18.1modules: 93nghttp2: 1.47.0napi: 8llhttp: 6.0.10openssl: 1.1.1q+quiccldr: 41.0icu: 71.1tz: 2022bunicode: 14.0ngtcp2: 0.8.1nghttp3: 0.7.0

github准备

创建github账号及仓库

  1. 创建一个github账号

    https://github.com/

  2. github上创建一个公开仓库，仓库名称和你的用户名一致,仓库名称为

    用户名.github.io

配置本地免密访问github

  1. 本地进入一个文件夹，如D:\blog,鼠标右键 弹出内容选中git bash here,进入git客户端命令窗口。

  2. 本地生成ssh秘钥对

    注意：不要用rsa算法，用ed25519算法，rsa算法被github认为不安全，会导致你无法做免密推送文件

    fzb@LAPTOP-U0PQ03U0 MINGW32 /d/blog$ ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -C "zhibfeng@126.com"Generating public/private ed25519 key pair.Enter file in which to save the key (/c/Users/fzb/.ssh/id_ed25519):Enter passphrase (empty for no passphrase):Enter same passphrase again:Your identification has been saved in /c/Users/fzb/.ssh/id_ed25519.Your public key has been saved in /c/Users/fzb/.ssh/id_ed25519.pub.The key fingerprint is:SHA256:RR5++Eks+F37b34HCvd5L0+clLaw++QJanmaiT7x81w zhibfeng@126.comThe key's randomart image is:+--[ED25519 256]--+|          o      ||         = +     ||        . * + .  ||         o * o ..||        S . +..+ ||         .. . *oo||          oo.= E+||         ..=*.X.B||        .oo==+.XO|+----[SHA256]-----+

  3. 按提示到/c/Users/fzb/.ssh/id_rsa.pub路径打开该秘钥公钥复制到github

​github右上角用户头像,点击找到Settings>,然后点击SSH and GPK keys

  1. 验证绑定秘钥是否成功

    fzb@LAPTOP-U0PQ03U0 MINGW32 /d/blog$ ssh -T git@github.comThe authenticity of host 'github.com (20.205.243.166)' can't be established.ECDSA key fingerprint is SHA256:p2QAMXNIC1TJYWeIOttrVc98/R1BUFWu3/LiyKgUfQM.Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)? yesWarning: Permanently added 'github.com,20.205.243.166' (ECDSA) to the list of known hosts.Hi brodenfeng! You've successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not provide shell access.

    显示successfuly说明成功。

Hexo本地初始化及服务启动

Hexo站点初始化

  1. 初始化Hexo

    $ hexo initINFO  Cloning hexo-starter https://github.com/hexojs/hexo-starter.gitINFO  Install dependenciesINFO  Start blogging with Hexo!npm install

    目录文件说明：

    .├── _config.yml#网站的 配置 信息，您可以在此配置大部分的参数。├── package.json#应用程序的信息。EJS, Stylus 和 Markdown renderer 已默认安装，您可以自由移除。├── scaffolds#模版 文件夹。当您新建文章时，Hexo 会根据 scaffold 来建立文件。Hexo的模板是指在新建的文章文件中默认填充的内容。例如，如果您修改scaffold/post.md中的Front-matter内容，那么每次新建一篇文章时都会包含这个修改。├── source#资源文件夹是存放用户资源的地方。除 _posts 文件夹之外，开头命名为 _ (下划线)的文件 / 文件夹和隐藏的文件将会被忽略。Markdown 和 HTML 文件会被解析并放到 public 文件夹，而其他文件会被拷贝过去。|   ├── _drafts|   └── _posts└── themes#主题文件夹。Hexo 会根据主题来生成静态页面。

  2. Hexo命令帮助

    fzb@LAPTOP-U0PQ03U0 MINGW32 /d/blog$ hexo --helpINFO  Validating configUsage: hexo <command>Commands:  clean     Remove generated files and cache.  config    Get or set configurations.  deploy    Deploy your website.  generate  Generate static files.  help      Get help on a command.  init      Create a new Hexo folder.  list      List the information of the site  migrate   Migrate your site from other system to Hexo.  new       Create a new post.  publish   Moves a draft post from _drafts to _posts folder.  render    Render files with renderer plugins.  server    Start the server.  version   Display version information.Global Options:  --config  Specify config file instead of using _config.yml  --cwd     Specify the CWD  --debug   Display all verbose messages in the terminal  --draft   Display draft posts  --safe    Disable all plugins and scripts  --silent  Hide output on consoleFor more help, you can use 'hexo help [command]' for the detailed informationor you can check the docs: http://hexo.io/docs/

本地启动Hexo服务

fzb@LAPTOP-U0PQ03U0 MINGW32 /d/blog$ hexo serverINFO  Validating configINFO  Start processingINFO  Hexo is running at http://localhost:4000/ . Press Ctrl+C to stop.

访问服务，浏览器打开http://localhost:4000/ 网址

写一篇自己的博客并发布

将写好的博客文档，如Markdown 和 HTML 文件会被解析并放到D:\blog\source_posts目录即可

本地博客发布到github

安装发布工具

fzb@LAPTOP-U0PQ03U0 MINGW32 /d/blog$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --saveadded 1 package, and audited 243 packages in 10s22 packages are looking for funding  run `npm fund` for detailsfound 0 vulnerabilities

配置Hexo发布地址

修改 _config.yml文件deploy参数

deploy:  type: git  repo: git@github.com:brodenfeng/brodenfeng.github.io.git  branch: main

注意：repo建议用ssh的地址，即git@github.com:brodenfeng/brodenfeng.github.io.git，如果用https的地址会在推送弹出输入账号密码窗口，你要手动输入账号和访问Token(令牌)。

发布到github

  1. 生成博客静态页面

    fzb@LAPTOP-U0PQ03U0 MINGW32 /d/blog$ hexo generateINFO  Validating configINFO  Start processingINFO  Files loaded in 139 msINFO  Generated: archives/index.htmlINFO  Generated: archives/2022/10/index.htmlINFO  Generated: index.htmlINFO  Generated: archives/2022/index.htmlINFO  Generated: fancybox/jquery.fancybox.min.cssINFO  Generated: js/jquery-3.4.1.min.jsINFO  Generated: css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.ttfINFO  Generated: js/script.jsINFO  Generated: css/style.cssINFO  Generated: css/fonts/FontAwesome.otfINFO  Generated: fancybox/jquery.fancybox.min.jsINFO  Generated: css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.eotINFO  Generated: css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.woffINFO  Generated: css/images/banner.jpgINFO  Generated: css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.woff2INFO  Generated: 2022/10/15/hello-world/index.htmlINFO  Generated: css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.svgINFO  17 files generated in 492 msfzb@LAPTOP-U0PQ03U0 MINGW32 /d/blog2

  2. 发布博客到github

    fzb@LAPTOP-U0PQ03U0 MINGW32 /d/blog$ hexo deployINFO  Validating configINFO  Deploying: gitINFO  Setting up Git deployment...Initialized empty Git repository in D:/blog2/.deploy_git/.git/[master (root-commit) 15cad16] First commit 1 file changed, 0 insertions(+), 0 deletions(-) create mode 100644 placeholderINFO  Clearing .deploy_git folder...INFO  Copying files from public folder...INFO  Copying files from extend dirs... create mode 100644 2022/10/15/hello-world/index.html create mode 100644 archives/2022/10/index.html create mode 100644 archives/2022/index.html create mode 100644 archives/index.html create mode 100644 css/fonts/FontAwesome.otf create mode 100644 css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.eot create mode 100644 css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.svg create mode 100644 css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.ttf create mode 100644 css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.woff create mode 100644 css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.woff2 create mode 100644 css/images/banner.jpg create mode 100644 css/style.css create mode 100644 fancybox/jquery.fancybox.min.css create mode 100644 fancybox/jquery.fancybox.min.js create mode 100644 index.html create mode 100644 js/jquery-3.4.1.min.js create mode 100644 js/script.js delete mode 100644 placeholderCounting objects: 34, done.Delta compression using up to 8 threads.Compressing objects: 100% (26/26), done.Writing objects: 100% (34/34), 882.37 KiB | 0 bytes/s, done.Total 34 (delta 3), reused 0 (delta 0)remote: Resolving deltas: 100% (3/3), done.To https://github.com/brodenfeng/brodenfeng.github.io.git + 256ee39...f2d2ab0 HEAD -> main (forced update)Branch master set up to track remote branch main from https://github.com/brodenfeng/brodenfeng.github.io.git.INFO  Deploy done: gitfzb@LAPTOP-U0PQ03U0 MINGW32 /d/blog2

    注意：如果你用的是https的repo地址，那执行命令后会弹窗输入用户名和密码，密码不是你的账号密码，而是你的令牌密码。

    令牌密码生成方法：github右上角用户头像,点击找到Settings,然后点击Developer settings,Personal access tokens,Generate  new token,权限建议全部选上，令牌过期时间按你自己的需求选择。

    所以建议用git的地址，这样我们配置的免密访问就可以避免这个问题了。

  3. 访问网站

如何避免每次提交都要输入密码

配置文件配置repo参数ssh地址， repo: git@github.com:brodenfeng/brodenfeng.github.io.git，然后配置秘钥免密
